title: Customizer Framework Code Editor field schema
description: Configure a Code Editor field in the Customizer

uploader.description: Set whether this editor can upload content. Adds an 'Upload Media' button above the editor. Type: boolean. Default: false

toolbars.description: Set which controls will be in the toolbar. ['bold', 'italic', 'strikethrough', 'bullist', 'numlist', 'blockquote', ...]
